info.title: NFT TOKEN API
info.description: API that aggregates blockchain data for Token Activity

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs...
The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...
The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...

token_description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs
The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs
cc0. Free mint. No Map. On Demon Time.

example_token_description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs

cursorParam.name: cursor
cursorParam.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

pageParam.name: page
pageParam.description: Starting page of results. First page is 1.

blockStartParam.name: block_start
blockStartParam.description: Starting block number for which to return results.

blockEndParam.name: block_end
blockEndParam.description: Ending block number for which to return results.

transactionHashParam.name: hash
transactionHashParam.description: The transaction hash for which to return results.

timestampEndParam.name: timestamp_end
timestampEndParam.description: Ending timestamp for which to return results.

activeWalletTimeframeParam.name: active_wallet_timeframe
activeWalletTimeframeParam.description: The timeframe for the price history data. Valid values are 1_DAY, and 7_DAYS

chainParam.name: chain
chainParam.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

orderParam.name: order
orderParam.description: Sort results in ascending or descending order

exchangeParam.name: exchange
exchangeParam.description: The marketplace exchange for which to return results.

exchangeRankingParam.name: ranking
exchangeRankingParam.description: The ranking metric for which to return results.

tokenTypeParam.name: token_type
tokenTypeParam.description: The token type for which to return results.

transferTypeParam.name: transfer_type
transferTypeParam.description: The transfer type for which to return results.

ownerTypeParam.name: owner_type
ownerTypeParam.description: The owner type for which to return results.

traitFilterParam.name: trait_filter
traitFilterParam.description: The trait type and values in JSON format to filter tokens by.

excludeDexParam.name: exclude_dex
excludeDexParam.description: Excludes DEX contracts from output when true. Default is false.

contractAddressesParam.name: contract_addresses
contractAddressesParam.description: A comma separated list of up to 25 contract addresses.

rarityRankStartParam.name: rarity_rank_start
rarityRankStartParam.description: The minimum rarity rank for tokens

rarityRankEndParam.name: rarity_rank_end
rarityRankEndParam.description: The maximum rarity rank for tokens

priceStartParam.name: price_start
priceStartParam.description: The minimum price in USD for tokens

priceEndParam.name: price_end
priceEndParam.description: The maximum price in USD for tokens

includeNftDetailsParam.name: include_nft_details
includeNftDetailsParam.description: Set to true to include nft metadata and cached media, default is false.

includeCurrentOwnersParam.name: include_current_owners
includeCurrentOwnersParam.description: Set to false to exclude returning current owners, default is true.

includeRecentPriceParam.name: include_recent_price
includeRecentPriceParam.description: Set to false to exclude returning recent price, default is true.

includeOwnerDistributionParam.name: include_owner_distribution
includeOwnerDistributionParam.description: Set to false to exclude token ownership distribution, default is true.

tokenIdParam.name: token_id
tokenIdParam.description: The token id as specified in the contract.

tokenIdsParam.name: token_ids
tokenIdsParam.description: A comma separated list of up to 25 token ids as specified in the contract.

fromAddressParam.name: from_address
fromAddressParam.description: Filters NFTs transfered from this wallet address

toAddressParam.name: to_address
toAddressParam.description: Filters NFTs transfered to this wallet address

ownerAddressParam.name: owner_address
ownerAddressParam.description: The wallet address of the NFT owner.

ExchangeSearchQParam.name: q
ExchangeSearchQParam.description: The search string for which to return results.

ExchangeSearchFilterParam.name: filter
ExchangeSearchFilterParam.description: The search fields to match on.

NftSearchQParam.name: q
NftSearchQParam.description: The search string for which to return results.

NftSearchFilterParam.name: filter
NftSearchFilterParam.description: The search fields to match on.

nftsOfOwnerFilterParam.name: filter
nftsOfOwnerFilterParam.description: Filter out spam NFTs by passing nospam.

get.description: Returns recently created or all historical collections. Filter by token type.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: The token type for which to return results.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

parameters.name: history
parameters.description: Retrieve all historical records.

get.description: Returns collection info by contract address.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...

get.description: Returns all currently owned collections by owner's wallet address.

parameters.name: owner_address
parameters.description: The wallet address of the NFT owner.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: The token type for which to return results.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort results in ascending or descending order

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

get.description: Sales pricing summary for given contract_address by various periods

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: timestamp_end
parameters.description: Ending timestamp for which to return results.

get.description: Sales pricing history for given contract_address by timeframe and binSize

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The timeframe for the price history data. Valid values are 1_DAY, 7_DAYS, and 30_DAYS. This parameter determines the valid binSize values: - 1_DAY: 15_MIN or 1_HOUR - 7_DAYS: 1_HOUR or 1_DAY - 30_DAYS: 1_DAY

parameters.name: bin_size
parameters.description: The bin size for aggregating price data, depends on the selected timeframe: - 1_DAY: 15_MIN or 1_HOUR - 7_DAYS: 1_HOUR or 1_DAY - 30_DAYS: 1_DAY

parameters.name: timestamp_end
parameters.description: Ending timestamp for which to return results.

get.description: Returns the wallet address for a given ENS name or a status 404 if the name is not found.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The ENS name

get.description: Returns an array of ENS names for a comma-separated list of wallet addresses. If no match is found, an empty string is returned.

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of addresses, up to 25 addresses in length

get.description: Returns recent updated exchange collections.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: exchange
parameters.description: The marketplace exchange for which to return results.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

200.description: An array of recent updated exchange collections

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...

get.description: Returns exchange collection info by exchange key.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: exchange
parameters.description: The marketplace exchange for which to return results.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The marketplace exchange key.

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...

get.description: Returns top exchange collections ranked by specified metric.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: exchange
parameters.description: The marketplace exchange for which to return results.

parameters.name: ranking
parameters.description: The ranking metric for which to return results.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

200.description: An array of top exchange collections ranked by specified metric

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs...

get.description: Searches for exchange collections by specified criteria.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: exchange
parameters.description: The marketplace exchange for which to return results.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search string for which to return results.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The search fields to match on.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

200.description: An array of recent exchange collections which match search criteria

description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs— unique digital collectibles ...

put.description: Submits a request to refresh NFT Metadata by contract address and token id.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: token_id
parameters.description: The token id as specified in the contract.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

200.description: Confirmation request to refresh NFT metadata was successful

msg.example: Metadata refresh submitted for requested NFT.

put.description: Submits a request to refresh NFT Metadata for entire collection.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

200.description: Confirmation request to refresh NFT metadata for collection was successful

msg.example: Metadata refresh submitted for requested Collection.

put.description: Submits a request to refresh NFT Metadata for all tokens owned by an address.

parameters.name: owner_address
parameters.description: The wallet address of the NFT owner.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

200.description: Confirmation request to refresh NFT metadata for owner was successful

msg.example: Metadata refresh submitted for requested Owner.

get.description: Returns recently created NFTs. Filter by token type.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: token_type
parameters.description: The token type for which to return results.

parameters.name: include_current_owners
parameters.description: Set to false to exclude returning current owners, default is true.

parameters.name: include_recent_price
parameters.description: Set to false to exclude returning recent price, default is true.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

parameters.name: price_start
parameters.description: The minimum price in USD for tokens

parameters.name: price_end
parameters.description: The maximum price in USD for tokens

parameters.name: include_nft_details
parameters.description: Set to true to include nft metadata and cached media, default is false.

parameters.name: exclude_dex
parameters.description: Excludes DEX contracts from output when true. Default is false.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

get.description: Returns nft transfer history over given timeframe

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: timestamp_end
parameters.description: Ending timestamp for which to return results.

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The timeframe for the price history data. Valid values are 1_DAY, 7_DAYS, and 30_DAYS. This parameter determines the valid binSize values: - 1_DAY: 15_MIN or 1_HOUR - 7_DAYS: 1_HOUR or 1_DAY - 30_DAYS: 1_DAY

parameters.name: bin_size
parameters.description: The bin size for aggregating price data, depends on the selected timeframe: - 1_DAY: 15_MIN or 1_HOUR - 7_DAYS: 1_HOUR or 1_DAY - 30_DAYS: 1_DAY

get.description: Returns all NFTs with Metadata for a given collection (contract address).

parameters.name: contract_address
parameters.description: The address of the contract.

parameters.name: token_ids
parameters.description: A comma separated list of up to 25 token ids as specified in the contract.

parameters.name: trait_filter
parameters.description: The trait type and values in JSON format to filter tokens by.

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Blockchain from which to return results.

parameters.name: rarity_rank_start
parameters.description: The minimum rarity rank for tokens

parameters.name: rarity_rank_end
parameters.description: The maximum rarity rank for tokens

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sort results in ascending or descending order

parameters.name: include_current_owners
parameters.description: Set to false to exclude returning current owners, default is true.

parameters.name: include_recent_price
parameters.description: Set to false to exclude returning recent price, default is true.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pass the cursor value from previous response to fetch next set of results.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page.

token_description.example: The Bored Ape Yacht Club is a collection of 10,000 unique Bored Ape NFTs

get.description: Uses fuzzy matching to discover NFT collections.
